name: MongoCollection.insert
purpose: Inserts an array into the collection

return.description:
If safe was set, returns an array containing the status of the insert.
   Otherwise, returns a boolean representing if the array was not empty (an empty array will not 
   be inserted).

errors: Throws MongoCursorException if the "safe" option is set and the insert fails. (Version 1.0.1+)

changelog.change:
Changed second parameter to an array of options.  Pre-1.0.5, the
        second parameter was a boolean indicating the "safe" option.
